column2: This character is the descendant of a god.
The Demigod trait is inherited patrilineally (from father to children of any gender).
The Demigod trait is inherited matrilineally (from mother to children of any gender).
The Demigod trait is inherited from any parent with the trait, regardless of gender.
No children will inherit the trait.
Only legitimate children of the dynasty of the parent with the trait inherits it.
Bastards are eligible to inherit the trait.
Which education trait do you want?
